ygData.subject: RE: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: They say to keep your number one inventory slot open - seems to be a bug in that if your main slots are full - items don t automatically go into your container
ygData.messageBody:
They say to keep your number one inventory slot open - seems to be a bug in
that if your main slots are full - items don't automatically go into your
container open slots (ie backpacks, etc.)

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 1999 7:51 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard quests

From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>

>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard quests
>Date: Fri, 15 Oct 1999 13:57:39 -0700
>
>Absolutely. Some idiot last night attacked Genni and
trained
>the entire Temple to the zone. Oddly enough Gardern stayed
>behind (out of his agro range, or player died) Then Genni
>was no where to be found, tracking or not. I still got the
>lambent sapphire to work, without her visually in the zone.
>
>Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk

Maybe Gardern conned green to that idiot.

Anyways, I am sure Gardern can cough up the Lambent
Sapphires because a
friend of mine is in newly acquired full Lambent.
Unfortunately, Gardern
decided to bug out on me. =(
I gave him a lambent stone and 2 sapphires (in seperate
slots, not stacked),
and he says, "blah blah blah here is your prize - a Lambent
Sapphire!!" I
get a bunch of faction changes, and some xp, but NO Lambent
Sapphire...*sigh*

So I petitioned, took a screenshot, bugged it, and even
/reported Gardern
heh =) (ah, what the hell).


Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
